I saw the film Baby Driver yesterday and it is IRRESPONSIBLE and setting a BAD EXAMPLE!  I decided to let my baby drive me home from the cinema -- *LIKE IN THE FILM* --- result?  *TWO* burst airbags, a collapsed wing and a **VERY EXPENSIVE EXCESS**!  How can we let these Hollywood types continue to produce this dangerous media????!!
